  • Top Tier ISPs including Internap [Level 3, XO, Sprint], Cogent and more being added!

  • Complete Root Access
  • All North American Based Support Staff

What makes our Virtual Servers better than the competition?
  • Powered by Dual Intel Quad Core Nehalem Xeon Processors
  • Enterprise Server Grade Hardware & Server Grade Hard Drives
  • Full-Hardware Guest OS Virtualization
  • Fault Tolerant Disk Arrays (RAID) /w Cache and BBU
  • High Speed 15K RPM HDDs for Exceptional Read/Write IO
  • Individual LVM-based Virtual Disk for Improved I/O Performance
  • Individually Assign Public Network VLAN for Increased Security
